item.title: Branding through events (Networking Series Part 4)
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: The types of events you attend shape your personal branding. Events overload I know you’re part of at least one group that has something to do with networking. And you also get asked a lot to attend major or minor events. It sometimes feels overwhelming and you can’t decide which events to attend. I’ll give you this tool to make a quick yet informed decision of which of all the events will really be the productive one for you.
